summary:
Are you tired of all those fancy house mods?
Do you play as an Argonian but there is no house mod that suits them?
Then this mod may be for you!
descriptionHtml:
An-Xileel agents were sent to Skyrim on a mission to investigate if they are able to plant Hist trees in Skyrim.
This is their hideout, but they already left to let other agents continue their mission. 
But the other agents won\'t arrive, now the hideout is yours!


The Hideout has everything you need:

Crafting
Alchemytable 
Enchantingtable
Chests to store your gear
Beds
and pets!


_________________________________________________________________________________________
Installation:
-------------
Just drag the Argonian Hideout.esp to your Skyrim Data folder, start the launcher, check Argonian Hideout if it isn\'t already and there you go!
Or just use the Nexus Mod Manager!


Uninstallation:
---------------
Make sure you removed ALL your gear from the Hideout (you will lose it if you don\'t do so!!!) and fast travel 
somewhere else (don\'t be IN the Hideout!), now you can delete the Argonian Hideout.esp!



|English is not my native language, so please tell me if I made any spelling or grammar mistakes in the discription or the journals in the Hideout|

|Also, report any bugs you may find so I can try to fix them|
author: BlackWolf25
